name: Sir Clixalot!
description:
Sir Clixalot!

Sir Clixalot! is an incremental clicker game made for Clicker Jam Autumn 2022!

Generate energy as Sir Clixalot to build up your land and generate further energy! Construct buildings, unlock upgrades, catch the golden gear of inspiration! Ascend to the skies!

Made in Unreal Engine 4
Design/code by Norishiopan
Music by SpiralFlip
Art by Nezartz
Additional help from Takbot
